mapper.select: SELECT t1.match_id, t2.dictionary_name project_category, t1.front_cover, t1.title, t1.match_abstract, t1.sign_time_str, t1.sign_time_end, t1.match_time_str, t1.match_time_end, t1.match_place, t1.organizer, t1.undertaker, t1.co_organizer, t1.match_summary, t1.reward, t1.route, t1.sign_attention, t1.other_tips, t1.publish_type FROM gen_match_info t1 LEFT JOIN data_dictionary t2 ON t1.project_category = t2.dictionary_id WHERE t1.is_delete = 0 AND t1.publish_type = 1 AND t1.match_id = #{matchId}

SELECT t1.match_id, t2.dictionary_name project_category, t1.front_cover, t1.title, t1.match_abstract, t1.sign_time_str, t1.sign_time_end, t1.match_time_str, t1.match_time_end, t1.match_place, t1.organizer, t1.undertaker, t1.co_organizer, t1.publish_type FROM gen_match_info t1 LEFT JOIN data_dictionary t2 ON t1.project_category = t2.dictionary_id WHERE t1.is_delete = 0
